review: The Amazon Fire Tv is easy to set up and use.  The movie and tv selection is excellent and I would guess will get even better.  It is nice the way Amazon has set up "categories" which makes it easy to search for comedy, adventure, etc.  The TV shows stream without commercials. The "Voice search" also works very well.  I would highly recommend this product.
author: W. Dunlap

review: I really like my Fire tv.  It makes watching Prime convenient.  The only drawback is that there are few movies I want to wachieve that I do not have to pay extra for.
